author: Christopher Carbone
title: Natural light, fresh air could keep coronavirus out of workplaces, scientists suggest
description: With millions of people adjusting to work-from-home orders and practicing social distancing, scientists are examining what simple changes could be made to home and office environments in order to reduce the spread of coronavirus.
content:
